step1.title: Create a new event
step1.subtitle: After the creation of the event you can invite participants via email.

step2.title: Event Details
step2.subtitle: Add some event details, so that your participants stay up to date.

attributes.subject: Event description
attributes.date: Date the event will take place

step3.title: Contact Details
step3.subtitle: Let the participants get to know you. Link you website and social media. Let the participants learn more about the event and increase your engagement.

step4.title: Where does the event take place?
step4.subtitle: Let the people now where the event will take place. This prevents your participants getting lost on the way.
step4.subtitleOnline: Let the people now where the event will take place. This prevents your participants joining last minute.

step5.title: What are the participation requirements?
step5.subtitle: You can change these settings always in the configuration menu of the event.

attributes.attendanceConfirmation: Request that the participants confirm their attendance to the event
